General.Name: Jeju Air Co Ltd
General.Description: Jeju Air Co., Ltd. provides airline services in South Korea, Japan, China, Taiwan, the Philippines, Vietnam, Thailand, and Guam. It also offers in-flight, airport, and other additional services. The company was founded in 2005 and is based in Jeju, South Korea. Jeju Air Co., Ltd. is a subsidiary of AK Holdings, Inc.
